options.description: Set min allowed radius. Allowed range is from 0 to 254. Default is 0.
options.name: min_r

options.description: Set max allowed radius. Allowed range is from 1 to 255. Default is 8.
options.name: max_r

options.description: Set which planes to process. By default, all are used.
options.name: planes

options.description: The action to take when EOF is encountered on the secondary input; it accepts one of the following values
options.name: eof_action

options.description: Force the output to terminate when the shortest input terminates.
options.name: shortest

options.description: force the filter to extend the last frame of secondary streams until the end of the primary stream.
options.name: repeatlast

choices.help: Frame from secondary input with the nearest lower or equal timestamp to the primary input frame.
choices.name: default

choices.help: Frame from secondary input with the absolute nearest timestamp to the primary input frame.
choices.name: nearest

options.description: How strictly to sync streams based on secondary input timestamps; it accepts one of the following values:
options.name: ts_sync_mode
